title: Nightwatch

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Take a walk at night, observing all actions that occur to two select players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn what happens to them, but not who did what. If the action is ambiguous, you will pick it out: if someone is roleblocked, you will learn what specific role the roleblocker is.
- If you visit someone and they attack their visitors, you will survive and learn their role. They will be notified that they missed you.

desc:
Post 21
*Lost to the eyes of the living, you wander--for you see what they do not.*
Astral Visitor
